name: Mount Kato
description: Located just one mile south of Mankato Minnesota in the scenic Minnesota River Valley. Skiing, Snowboarding and Snow Tubing. With 19 Trails, 8 Chairlifts, 2 Terrain Parks, 2 Conveyor Lifts (beginner area & tubing park), a Food Court, The Li Bar & Grill, a Certified Ski/Snowboard School, 100% Snow Making, Full-Service Rental Shop, a Tuning Center & Accessory Shop, Summer Mountain Biking. Nice views, no lift lines and terrain that fits everyone in the family.
